column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I ordered the Spicy Tonkotsu.  The broth was ok
column2: but the noodles were too al dente.  The meat was was way overcooked which made it mushy.  We also ordered the takoyaki which was a big fat MEH.  Also
column3: we had to ask twice for an extra bowl and again twice for extra chopsticks.  Who brings you an extra bowl without chopsticks?
